query.name: follow_prize_name
query.description: The name of the follow prize,The follow prize name length max limit is 20.

query.name: campaign_id
query.description: The unique identifier for the created follow prize.

query.name: start_time
query.description: The timing from when the follow prize is valid,the start time later than the current time.If the start time and end time passed in by the seller overlap with other upcoming/ongoing activities, it will prompt "Another Follow Prize voucher already exists during this time period, please set another period."

query.name: end_time
query.description: The timing until when the follow prize is still valid,the end time must be greater than the start time by at least 1 day and end time cannot exceed 3 months after start time.If the start time and end time passed in by the seller overlap with other upcoming/ongoing activities, it will prompt "Another Follow Prize voucher already exists during this time period, please set another period."

query.name: usage_quantity
query.description: Please enter a value between 1 and 200000.

query.name: min_spend
query.description: The minimum spend required for using this follow prize.

schema.name: campagin_id
schema.description: The unique identifier for the created follow prize.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.
